title: Symbolism in Guardians of The Galaxy v.2 | Pathological Identity
description:
Exploring of the symbolism of super-hero movies and focusing on Guardians of the Galaxy v.2

patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/PageauCarvings

for the interview I did with Jordan Peterson, see 
https://youtu.be/Ixc9i1G7eew
